attributes.action: reinstate and respect human rights for all people in care homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Human rights should not be removed from people when they enter a care home. All human rights should be respected and reinstated before we all become sub-human,  ie. without care. Even those who break the law have human rights, it is outrageous that they are stripped from the most vulnerable poeple in society .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
